function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Perception of higher COVID-19 infection risk due to proximity to out-group members and unfamiliar environments","Impact":"Higher risk perception leads to increased anxiety and safety concerns","Mitigation":"Promote education and awareness about safety measures and provide adequate support for mental health","Technologies":"Social media campaigns, online resources for mental health support","People":"Tourists, travelers","Owner":"Health authorities, tourism organizations"},{"Description":"Psychological risk associated with undesirable travel experience and pandemic-related anxiety","Impact":"Increased anxiety and safety concerns among tourists","Mitigation":"Provide support for mental health and address psychological factors influencing risk perception","Technologies":"Online counseling services, educational materials on managing travel-related anxiety","People":"Tourists, travelers","Owner":"Tourism organizations, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Social risk related to negative changes in others' opinions and attitudes towards travelers in a tourism context","Impact":"Perception of social stigma and judgment, leading to decreased well-being and increased stress","Mitigation":"Promote inclusivity and understanding, address stigma through communication and empathy-building initiatives","Technologies":"Diversity training, social awareness campaigns","People":"Travelers, local communities","Owner":"Tourism organizations, local community leaders"}]}
